verses.verse: "And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> He who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G3592>this:<s%> 'I <S%G3609>know<s%> your <S%G2041>deeds,<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> that you are <S%G2198>alive,<s%> but you are <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G1127>'Wake<s%> up, and <S%G4741>strengthen<s%> the <S%G3062>things<s%> that <S%G3062>remain,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> were <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G599>die;<s%> for I have not <S%G2147>found<s%> your <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G4137>completed<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of My <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3421>'Remember<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4459>what<s%> you have <S%G2983>received<s%> and <S%G191>heard;<s%> and <S%G5083>keep<s%> [it,] and <S%G3340>repent.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you will not <S%G1127>wake<s%> up, I will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2812>thief,<s%> and you will not <S%G1097>know<s%> at <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> I will <S%G2240>come<s%> upon you.

'But you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G3686>people<s%> in <S%G4554>Sardis<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> have not <S%G3435>soiled<s%> their <S%G2440>garments;<s%> and they will <S%G4043>walk<s%> with Me in <S%G3022>white;<s%> for they are <S%G514>worthy.<s%>

'He who <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> shall <S%G3779>thus<s%> be <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>garments;<s%> and I will not <S%G1813>erase<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> from the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> and I will <S%G3670>confess<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> My <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and <S%G1799>before<s%> His <S%G32>angels.<s%>
'He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches.<s%> '

"And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G5359>Philadelphia<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> from He who is <S%G40>holy,<s%> who is <S%G228>true,<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> who <S%G455>opens<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> will <S%G2808>shut,<s%> and who <S%G2808>shuts<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G455>opens,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> this: <S%G3592><s%>

'I <S%G3609>know<s%> your <S%G2041>deeds.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I have <S%G1325>put<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> you an <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2808>shut,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> and have <S%G5083>kept<s%> My <S%G3056>word,<s%> and have not <S%G720>denied<s%> My <S%G3686>name.<s%>

<S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> I will <S%G1325>cause<s%> [those] of the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> who <S%G3004>say<s%> that they are <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and are not, but <S%G5574>lie<s%> â€“ <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> them to <S%G2240>come<s%> and <S%G4352>bow<s%> <S%G4352>down<s%> at your <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and to <S%G1097>know<s%> that I have <S%G25>loved<s%> you.

<S%G3754>'Because<s%> you have <S%G5083>kept<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of My <S%G5281>perseverance,<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> will <S%G5083>keep<s%> you from the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G3986>testing,<s%> that [hour] which is <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> upon the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world,<s%> to <S%G3985>test<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> upon the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

'I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G5035>quickly;<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> <S%G2902>fast<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G2192>have,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> your <S%G4735>crown.<s%>

'He who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> him a <S%G4769>pillar<s%> in the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of My <S%G2316>God,<s%> and he will not <S%G1831>go<s%> out from it <S%G2089>anymore;<s%> and I will <S%G1125>write<s%> upon him the <S%G3686>name<s%> of My <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> of My <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> which <S%G2597>comes<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> from My <S%G2316>God,<s%> and My <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>
'He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches.<s%>'

"And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G2993>Laodicea<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> from The <S%G281>Amen,<s%> the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G3144>Witness,<s%> the <S%G746>Beginning<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> this: <S%G3592><s%>

'I <S%G3609>know<s%> your <S%G2041>deeds,<s%> that you are <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G5593>cold<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2200>hot;<s%> I <S%G3785>would<s%> that you were <S%G5593>cold<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2200>hot.<s%>

<S%G3779>'So<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you are <S%G5513>lukewarm,<s%> and <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2200>hot<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G5593>cold,<s%> I <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G1692>spit<s%> you out of My <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G3754>'Because<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4145>rich,<s%> and have <S%G4147>become<s%> <S%G4147>wealthy,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G3762>nothing,<s%>" and you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> that you are <S%G5005>wretched<s%> and <S%G1652>miserable<s%> and <S%G4434>poor<s%> and <S%G5185>blind<s%> and <S%G1131>naked,<s%>

I <S%G4823>advise<s%> you to <S%G59>buy<s%> from Me <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G4448>refined<s%> by <S%G4442>fire,<s%> that you may <S%G4147>become<s%> <S%G4147>rich,<s%> and <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>garments,<s%> that you may <S%G4016>clothe<s%> yourself, and [that] the <S%G152>shame<s%> of your <S%G1132>nakedness<s%> may not be <S%G5319>revealed;<s%> and <S%G2854>eye<s%> <S%G2854>salve<s%> to <S%G1472>anoint<s%> your <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> that you may <S%G991>see.<s%>
<S%G3745>'Those<s%> <S%G3745>whom<s%> I <S%G5368>love,<s%> I <S%G1651>reprove<s%> and <S%G3811>discipline;<s%> be <S%G7089>zealous<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3340>repent.<s%>

<S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> I <S%G2476>stand<s%> at the <S%G2374>door<s%> and <S%G2925>knock;<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> My <S%G5456>voice<s%> and <S%G455>opens<s%> the <S%G2374>door,<s%> I will <S%G1525>come<s%> in to him, and will <S%G1172>dine<s%> with him, and he with Me.

'He who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> I will <S%G1325>grant<s%> to him to <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> with Me on My <S%G2362>throne,<s%> as I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3528>overcame<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> with My <S%G3962>Father<s%> on His <S%G2362>throne.<s%>
'He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches.<s%>' "
